description: Data artifact build based on schemas defined in a Reflekt project.

ci.description: Whether the command was knowingly run in a CI/CD environment.

count_schemas.description: The number of schemas for which the data artifact was built.

data_artifact.description: The type of data artifact that was built.

data_warehouse.description: The type of data warehouse storing the raw event data.

profile_id.description: Unique identifier for the Reflekt profile. MD5 hash of the profile name.

project_id.description: Unique identifier for the Reflekt project. MD5 hash of the project name.

sdk.description: The SDK used to collect the event data.

source_id.description: Unique identifier for the Reflekt source. MD5 hash of the --source argument.
